content: Hi all,Our team is growing! Since there are many #statistics and #data people here, please boost and share widely this rare recruitment call from #Unesco Institute of Statistics. UIS is #hiring a senior management team to update it as a modern stats organisation. UIS is the home of global #education statistics and monitoring progress towards the #SDG 4.   https://uis.unesco.org/en/news/uis-hiring

A few of the teams that I work with at Docker, Inc are hiring! We are hiring! Looking for a statistical programmer / data analyst to work on a NIH R01-funded project using Medicaid data.More details below. We are looking for someone with experience in SAS and/or Stata, training in biostatistics, epidemiology, economics, statistics, or a related field.Experience accessing and analyzing administrative claims data, particularly CMS data, is a plus. #hiring #hiringnow #datascience #data #statisticshttps://partners.taleo.net/careersection/ghc/jobdetail.ftl?job=3230597&tz=GMT-05%3A00&tzname=America%2FNew_York

Reminder : üé∫ We're #hiring:Chief Data Officer for #marine augmented observatories on French Coasts, dealing with #environment, #imaging and #omics #data within the AO-#EMBRC project.https://place-emploi-public.gouv.fr/offre-emploi/chief-data-scientist-fh-refscsi2-reference-2022-1056743/DM me for more info

So I'm hiring for a role in my team and got my first batch of (thankfully shortlisted) CVs from our HR team today. I don't mind the recruitment process - I love speaking to new people and talking about their stories & experience, it's really exciting. But hoo boy, working my way through a list of mostly badly written PDFs is a grind. üò™As a hiring manager, a token piece of advice for any job hunters out there - please make your CV skimmable! I'm mainly looking for critical keywords related to the role. ‚å®Ô∏è Try using dotpoints with the relevant words bolded that explained what you did. Remove ALL of the waffly sentences; leave (some of) the waffle for the interview. Less is more.All that said, if you have a bit of #DataEngineering experience, you're in Australia and looking for a junior role, DM me! üòÉ I'll definitely enjoy a conversation on Mastodon more than skimming through a sanitised resume.#hiring #recruitment #jobs #data #datadon

I am currently learning Ionic with Node JS and TypeScript, and some Unity.Preferably for a company in the UK.#hiring #tech #science #remote #biology #health #gaming #web #developing #job #javascript #coding #data #database #longevity #geroscience #aging #student #programming

The great folks at the Mercy Corps office in the Netherlands are #hiring for a Data Protection Officer. This is a great opportunity for a candidate who wants to get a start in #humanitarian #data #protection. Application and details: https://jobs.jobvite.com/mercycorps/job/oPmDlfwTCandidate needs to have the right to work in NL and will be the point of contact for the Autoriteit Persoonsgegevens (AP) as the European supervisory authority so language skills are a must. Perhaps @ademoor has some suggestions?

The ACCESS-NRI (who I don't think are on Mastodon yet) have several open positions for #HPC #data #modelling #engineers in #Canberra #CBR, that are #female-only or enby identified. ACCESS-NRI is part of ANU. ---We seek women and women-identifying Research Software Engineers with knowledge and experience in one or more of the following areas:üëâ Computational modellingüëâ Analysing and evaluating large data outputsüëâ Profiling and optimisation of codeüëâ Software development (including curation and maintenance of code repositories)üëâ Developing and delivering training materialsWork type: Continuing (Contingent Funded)Classification: ANU Officer 7 ‚Äì 8 (Information Technology)Salary package: $92,100 ‚Äì $110,821 per annum, plus 17% superannuationTerm: Full-time, Continuing (Contingent Funded), until end of 2024, with possibility of extension (multiple positions)---Sure, money's not great, the but the super is great to get under your belt early, and you'd be working with super smart people, so a great upskilling role. #jobs #researchinfrastructure #hiring #academia #academic

We hope future researchers in #recruitment, #selection, and other HR areas will make good use of our dataset! And as always, thanks to my amazing collaborators John, Pete, & Renee (an undergrad honors student!) for their help!https://doi.org/10.5334/jopd.69#hiring #jobs #research #data

@nova Nuna (nuna.com) is hiring! We have openings in almost all departments, but especially Engineering and Data Science. We are a remote friendly company, though applicants must live in the U.S.Our mission is to help make high-quality healthcare affordable and accessible for everyone.https://boards.greenhouse.io/nuna/#jobs #hiring #Healthcare #data(anyone is free to DM me if you have any questions)sorry for the re-post but I realized my original post didn't say what we do! üòÖ

The #California #Policy Lab has an opening for a Ph.D.-level Senior Researcher in Applied #Microeconomics and #Quantitative Public Policy, which has a salary range is $105k-$155k. See their full posting at https://www.capolicylab.org/careers/senior-researcher/#jobs #hiring #PublicPolicy #SocialScience #SocialPolicy #Econ #QuantMethods #data #ResearchDesign #ResearchMethods #EconJobMarket #AltAc #AltAcJobs #AppliedEcon
